explanation: [0-0] In a kitchen, a chef in a white chef's uniform stands at a counter, smiling, holding a metal slotted spoon in his right hand and a white plate in his left hand. There is a black ceramic pot on the counter with a metal lid on it. The background is a white brick wall. Behind the chef is another counter where you can see other staff and kitchenware.
